comments:
NullPointer exception is while adding the Extensions to Plugin.xml
Steps to reproduce.
1. Create a Plugin project without selecting any predefined templates
2. In the extension tab click Add to add new Extension
3. Select the "org.eclipse.ui.actionSets" extension and select the available 
template and click Next
4. NullPointer Exception is thrown when user clicks Finish button.

This NPE is also thrown when user selects following extension points
-org.eclipse.ui.editors
-org.eclipse.ui.newWizards
-org.eclipse.ui.popupMenus
-org.eclipse.ui.preferencePages
-org.eclipse.ui.propertyPages
-org.eclipse.ui.views

The stacktrace is as follows
